scope: Conflict & Peace Science, Administrative & Management Sciences.
rules: Manuscripts must be original and not under consideration elsewhere.
All manuscripts are subjected to a double-blind reviewing process (anonymized).
A separate title page must be submitted containing title, authorâ€™s name, contact, bio, and acknowledgement.
Manuscripts should be between 5000 and 8000 words in MS Word format with an abstract of max 200 words.

Evaluation parameters: Readability, literature/theory use, method appropriateness, data significance, contribution to knowledge.
Citations and references must follow APA referencing style (7th Edition).
Submission via email to: j_peaceserviceacademy@gamip.org and copy osereme1@gmail.com.

plagiarism_policy: Strict peer-review. Any manuscript with a similarity index greater than 20% will be declined.
copyright_policy: Copyright remains with the author(s). Permission must be obtained for reproduction. Once published, it cannot be published elsewhere without permission.
